title: Enclave Black taking applications for MID (D2+)
body:
Approaching the new season of open ladder, Enclave Black is looking to solidify and finalize it's roster for the highest chances of getting into OCS.
Currently we are looking for MID main which is Diamond 2 + to join our main roster.
Enclave Black is run as a serious team with a competitive mentality . We currently have a manager/coach but are looking for some more enthusiastic supporting staff to help our team move forward. Being part of the Enclave organisation provides benefits such as: Organized Scrims,fees for tournament entries and name changes covered.

Requirements:
- Diamond 2+
- Diverse champion pool and ability to adapt
- Strong communication skills
- Availability from Monday-Thursday, 7:30pm-10:30pm AEST (as well as some weekends, for tournaments)
- A willingness to accept and provide constructive criticism

Feel free to email any questions or queries to: charliewraith@outlook.com
Alternatively, add "FrozenArrow" or "Bigmommafrank'' In game

P.S If you are interested in applying for other positions in the team firstly please meet the criteria and then
secondly please main the role that you are applying for.
